TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ImmutableArray extends System.Object

Docs.summary:
Provides methods for creating an array that is immutable; meaning it cannot be changed once it is created.
[!INCLUDE[immutable_nuget_short](~/includes/immutable-nuget-short-md.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static int BinarySearch<T> (this System.Collections.Immutable.ImmutableArray<T> array, T value);
.method public static hidebysig int32 BinarySearch<T>(valuetype System.Collections.Immutable.ImmutableArray`1<!!T> array, !!T value) cil managed

Docs.typeparam: The type of element stored in the array.
Docs.param: The sorted array to search.
The object to search for.
Docs.summary: Searches the sorted immutable array for a specified element using the default comparer and returns the zero-based index of the element, if it’s found.
Docs.returns: The zero-based index of the item in the array, if item is found; otherwise, a negative number that is the bitwise complement of the index of the next element that is larger than or, if there is no larger element, the bitwise complement of .
Docs.exception: does not implement or the search encounters an element that does not implement .

The function to apply to each element from the source array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This overload allows efficient creation of an <xref:System.Collections.Immutable.ImmutableArray%601> based on an existing <xref:System.Collections.Immutable.ImmutableArray%601>, where a mapping function needs to be applied to each element from the source array.

The index of the first element in the source array to include in the resulting array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This overload allows efficient creation of an <xref:System.Collections.Immutable.ImmutableArray%601> based on a slice of an existing <xref:System.Collections.Immutable.ImmutableArray%601>, where a mapping function needs to be applied to each element from the source array included in the resulting array.
